content.body: There are some obvious places to account for it, like adding an options bag to the import method. Probably also obviously necessary to thread those options into the loadHook.

content.body: But also perhaps obviously _not_ thread it into the loadHook, because that invites the virtual host to abuse it for non-assertions.
